fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 gained 101.45 points or 0.57% to settle at 17,915.05. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 1.95% to 11.43. Reliance Industries (RIL), Infosys and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The May 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 25 May 2023.
